name: deimosrising
text: I think this is the first strip where it is established that Phillipe is five, but I am unceratain.

text: I believe this is the first explicit mention, though the shift in characterization can be seen much earlier.

text: It's interesting how Lyle can be a dick even to a five-year old child.

text: Most people would be like that after draining a fifth of whiskey.

name: stuart
text: Reciprocally, Lyle is like that after drinking 5 of whiskey.

text: 25 bottles of Jack on the wall, 25 bottles of Jack... Take one down, pass it around-- SOMEBODY CALL AN AMBULANCE

text: When that happens, there will be something wrong.

text:

text: Dammit that was so what I was about to say.

text: Lyle is true to himself - but he should still try to curb his attitude around Philippe

text: Look how weird Lyle looks. those arms... THOSE ARMS. You've come a long way, Onstad.

text: Those knives?

text: These knives! And arms

text: Those arms hold those knives.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He...he has FINGERS!

name: shoinan
text: In Phillipe's mind newspapers print reports of events on the same day they occur and services occur just a day after death. Bless.

name: dougthehead
text: And the services are held at The Cemetery.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "My housewarming is this weekend!"

name: crinklebat
text: I love the capitalization of "Shove It" to the point where I feel like maybe it should not be legal.

name: woodenteeth
text: I could never get over the fact that Lyle's mostach ALWAYS looked like a oversized mouth to me. I couldn't shake it for ages. Like looking at the vase and not the faces.

name: ovenface
text: Because it was a mouth in the beginning! Look at the cast photo. you were right .

name: tfaironpirate
text: Dude, if I get that thing now where people tell me stuff like this, and suddenly I realize it for the first time, but then can NEVER look at it normal again, I'm going to knock your teeth out.

name: woodenteeth
text: Please see my screen-name. You can't threaten me .

name: tfaironpirate
text: Oh shit! Layers upon layers...

name: joeyramoney
text: that's what killed andy warhol.

name: molesticide
text:
panel one- lyle is littering with such INTENSITY.

panel two- lyle is calmly pointing out to philipe that he would prefer it if the otter were to, instead of delivering moral judgments on his character, in fact Shove it.

panel three- philippe's "shocked expression!" lines are still hovering above his head.

panel four- services will be held in the cemetery.

name: snowman
text: If you read this comment aloud, blind people can enjoy Achewood!

name: em2
text: DAAAAAAMN!

name: hendetta
text: Phliippe is feeling absolute despair in that last panel.

name: tfaironpirate
text: Never since Snoopy Balls has such despair been felt.

name: harletron
text: It's a swoon, Phillipe is swooning like a late 18th century fop. all such a "my word!" and "goodness gracious.."

name: retinarow
text: Phillipe was 5.

name: a-halter
text: One of my all time favorite's.  Phillipe's imagination is a goldmine of extremely simple and nearly perfect material.

name: lux
text: what is more tragic than a five-year-old imagining (and feeling) anguish so hard it sends you to the grave?

name: solobuttons
text: I imagine that it just broke his little heart

name: steerpike66
text: Philippe is dead and he's having a housewarming! for shame.

name: kikineko
text: Now what happens if we say this to all 5 year-old kids?  I imagine how the results are like...

name: capnroblivious
text: It's somehow worse here that he's mean to Philippe than when he was very recently trying to detail his plan to kick Jesus.

text: 5 year olds are such drama queens.
